short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cookie Clicker is an awesome idle clicker game with a baking theme. Bake cookies by clicking on a giant cookie.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start by clicking the giant cookie to produce cookies â€“ each time you click you generate one additional cookie. As your number of cookies increase you can purchase upgrades and a workforce. To start with, your fingers will take a hammering - you have to continually click to generate cookies and revenue. As time progresses, however, you can purchase automated upgrades. This allows you to stop clicking, and watch the game do the work for you.

Features
Idle clicking gameplay
Fantastic range of upgrades and research
Funny phrases and humorous gameplay

Controls
Left click to interact with menu items
Left click on the giant cookie to produce cookies
